Package map.teamc.com.maplocationproject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddFriendFragment
    Fragment class - Add new friends view
    CheckinFragment
    Class that contains the fragment to create a new checkin It also contains a private class to populate a Spinner with the places obtained from Google Places
    Client
    Class that makes the request calls to the server
    ContactAdapter
    Class that creates the layout for adding a new friend
    ContactItem
    Class for the potential friend's object
    DeleteFriendFragment
    Class that contains the fragment to view friends and request deletion
    Friend
    Class for the friend's object
    FriendAdapter
    Class that creates the layout for the friend's list and the buttons for viewing location or checkins
    FriendDeleteAdapter
    Class that creates the layout for the friend's list and a button for deleting them
    FriendRequest
    Class for the friend's request object
    LocationFriendFragment
    Class that contains the fragment to view friends and request their location and checkins
    LocationUtils
    Defines app-wide constants and utilities
    LoginActivity
    Class that manage the Login Activity
    MapActivity
    ActionBarActivity, this is the main activity, it is divided in content_frame and a menu list.
    MapView
    Class that contains the fragment of the map
    Model
    Class for the DrawMenu list of items
    MyAdapter
    Class that creates the layout for the DrawMenu list
    PhoneVerificationActivity
    Class aCtivity - Layout for the Phone Verification screen
    Place
    Class for the Places object obtained through GooglePlaces API
    PlacesService
    Class that makes the call to GooglePlaces
    RegisterActivity
    Class that manage the Register Activity
    RequestAdapter
    Class that creates the layout for the friend's request list and the buttons for accepting or rejecting the request
    RequestFriendFragment
    Class that contains the fragment to view friends' requests
    RequestItem
    Class for the request items' object
    User
    Class that contains the user information - Register
    UserLocation
    Class that manages the objects of the periodical updates of the user's location
